tool_description: Manages knowledge base category hierarchies, creates new categories, and assigns articles to appropriate categories based on content analysis and business rules.

action_type.description: Action to perform: create_category, assign_article, update_hierarchy, or analyze_content

category_name.description: Name of the category to create or work with

parent_category.description: Parent category name for hierarchical organization

article_content.description: Article content to analyze for category assignment

business_domain.description: Business domain: Technical, Billing, Account, Product, or General

error_messages: Invalid action type: Must be one of create_category, assign_article, update_hierarchy, or analyze_content
Invalid business domain: Must be one of Technical, Billing, Account, Product, or General
Missing required fields: category_name required for create_category and update_hierarchy actions
Missing article content: article_content required for assign_article and analyze_content actions
Category hierarchy depth exceeded: Maximum of 5 levels allowed in category hierarchy
Duplicate category name: Category name already exists in the specified parent category
usage: Specify action_type and business_domain. For category creation, provide category_name and optionally parent_category. For article assignment, provide article_content to analyze and determine appropriate categories.

category_path.description: Full hierarchical path of the category
